forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 56. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 8pm, then a slight chance of rain between 8pm and 9pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, a canvas of partly sunny skies stretches above, lightly brushed with clouds that dance along the horizon. The air feels fresh as a brisk west wind kicks up to 20 mph, teasing the branches and ruffling hats as it whips down the streets. A slight chance of showers lingers—the kind that adds a delicate hum to the atmosphere, perhaps giving rise to spontaneous conversations under the light, fleeting clouds. As the temperature hovers near 56, an odd twist of warmth blankets you, yet the wind keeps a watchful eye on the warmth, reminding you of its presence with each gust. 

As dusk approaches tonight, the sky will shift towards a cooler demeanor, settling into mostly clear conditions with a low of 46. The vestiges of a slight chance of rain will fade, leaving many moments of tranquility under a star-studded sky. Dressing warmly, with layers both breathable and snug, is key to savoring the changing temperatures as the night unfolds. Taking a stroll down the Embarcadero would be a lovely choice—perhaps a quiet sit at one of the outdoor cafes, a steaming cup in hand as the soft hum of the city drifts away into the night’s embrace. In this peculiar stillness, one might catch the outline of the Golden Gate Bridge against the darkening horizon, a testament to the beautiful contradictions that define this unique city.
